snippet: New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick ended a quarterback controversy before one could even begin as he said on Wednesday that Tom Brady will be the team's starter when he returns from a suspension....
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick ended a quarterback controversy before one could even begin as he said on Wednesday that Tom Brady will be the team's starter when he returns from a suspension.

headline.main: Patriots Shoot Down Possibility of Quarterback Controversy
headline.print_headline: Patriots Shoot Down Possibility of Quarterback Controversy
